mapper.select: SELECT T.*, T1.vendor_name, T2.store_name FROM ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, org_order_id, vendor_id, delivery_type_cd, delivery_center_id, delivery_area_cd, shipment, order_type, order_method, payment_type, promotion_id, order_date, delivery_date, expire_date, receive_date, vendor_address, store_address, order_sts, nr_flg, order_remark, purchase_vat_cd, tax_rate, order_amt, order_tax, receive_amt, receive_tax, order_differentiate, upload_flg, upload_date,return_type FROM OD0000 WHERE store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM MA2000 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T1 ON T.vendor_id = T1.vendor_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT store_cd, CONCAT(store_cd,' ',store_name,' ',store_name_en) AS store_name FROM MA1000 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T2 ON T.store_cd = T2.store_cd

SELECT T.*, T1.article_name,T1.article_name_en, T1.spec FROM ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, serial_no, article_id, barcode, vendor_id,is_free_item,is_free_item as is_free_item_t, promotion_id, order_unit, order_qty, order_price,order_nocharge_qty,receive_nocharge_qty, order_amt, receive_price, receive_qty, receive_total_amt, reason_id, correction_difference,correction_nocharge_qty FROM OD0010 WHERE store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, article_name, article_name_en, spec FROM MA1100 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T1 ON T.article_id = T1.article_id ORDER BY serial_no ASC LIMIT ${rows} OFFSET ${limitStart}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, serial_no, article_id, barcode, vendor_id,is_free_item,is_free_item as is_free_item_t, promotion_id, order_unit, order_qty, order_price,order_nocharge_qty,receive_nocharge_qty, order_amt, receive_price, receive_qty, receive_total_amt, reason_id, correction_difference,correction_nocharge_qty FROM OD0010 WHERE store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, article_name, article_name_en, spec FROM MA1100 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T1 ON T.article_id = T1.article_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO od0000 ( store_cd, order_id, org_order_id, vendor_id, delivery_type_cd, delivery_center_id, delivery_area_cd, order_type, order_method, order_date, order_remark, order_amt, receive_amt, create_user_id, create_ymd, create_hms, update_user_id, update_ymd, update_hms, order_sts, receive_date,return_type ) VALUES ( #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '999', '00000', '000000', #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '20', #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{receiveAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{commonDTO.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonDTO.createYmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonDTO.createHms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonDTO.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonDTO.updateYmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonDTO.updateHms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '04', #{commonDTO.createYmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update od0000 set upload_flg = null, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_id = #{commonDTO.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_ymd = #{commonDTO.updateYmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_hms = #{commonDTO.updateHms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT store_cd k, order_id v,return_type hidek FROM OD0000 WHERE order_type = '02' AND order_sts = '04' AND store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LOWER(order_id) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) and review_status = 20

SELECT T.*, T0.order_price AS orderPrice, T0.order_qty AS orderQty, T0.order_amt AS orderAmt, T1.article_name AS articleName, T1.article_name_en AS articleNameEn, T1.spec FROM ( SELECT O1.store_cd AS storeCd, O1.order_id AS orderId, O1.serial_no AS serialNo, O1.article_id AS articleId, O1.barcode, O1.vendor_id AS vendorId, O1.order_unit AS orderUnit, O1.order_price AS rrOrderPrice, O1.receive_qty AS rrOrderQty,O1.receive_qty AS rrOrderQty1, (O1.order_price * O1.receive_qty) AS rrOrderAmt, O.org_order_id,O1.order_nocharge_qty,receive_nocharge_qty FROM OD0000 O, OD0010 O1 WHERE O.order_type = '02' AND O.order_sts = '04' AND O.store_cd = O1.store_cd AND O.order_id = O1.order_id AND O.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND O.store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o1.is_free_item = '0' ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, article_id, order_price, order_qty, order_amt FROM OD0010 ) T0 ON T.org_order_id = T0.order_id AND T.storeCd = T0.store_cd AND T.articleId = T0.article_id /* ON T.storeCd = T0.store_cd AND T.articleId = T0.article_id */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, article_name, article_name_en, spec FROM MA1100 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T1 ON T.articleId = T1.article_id ORDER BY T.serialNo LIMIT ${rows} OFFSET ${limitStart}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT O1.store_cd AS storeCd, O1.order_id AS orderId, O1.serial_no AS serialNo, O1.article_id AS articleId, O1.barcode, O1.vendor_id AS vendorId, O1.order_unit AS orderUnit, O1.order_price AS rrOrderPrice, O1.receive_qty AS rrOrderQty, (O1.order_price * O1.receive_qty) AS rrOrderAmt, O.org_order_id,O1.order_nocharge_qty,receive_nocharge_qty FROM OD0000 O, OD0010 O1 WHERE O.order_type = '02' AND O.order_sts = '04' AND O.store_cd = O1.store_cd AND O.order_id = O1.order_id AND O.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND O.store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o1.is_free_item = '0' ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, article_id, order_price, order_qty, order_amt FROM OD0010 ) T0 ON T.org_order_id = T0.order_id AND T.storeCd = T0.store_cd AND T.articleId = T0.article_id /* ON T.storeCd = T0.store_cd AND T.articleId = T0.article_id */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, article_name, article_name_en, spec FROM MA1100 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T1 ON T.articleId = T1.article_id

SELECT T1.vendor_id, T2.vendor_name FROM ( SELECT store_cd, receive_id, order_id FROM OD0000_T WHERE store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND receive_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T JOIN ( SELECT store_cd, order_id, vendor_id FROM OD0000 )T1 ON T.order_id = T1.order_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM MA2000 WHERE #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date ) T2 ON T1.vendor_id = T2.vendor_id

SELECT A.on_hand_qty,A.on_order_qty,A.article_id,B.spec,B.article_name,B.unit_id,B.spec,B.unit_name, (SELECT distinct MA1110.default_barcode FROM MA1110 WHERE MA1110.article_id=#{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MA1110.vendor_id = A.major_vendor_id AND (#{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} between MA1110.effective_start_date and MA1110.effective_end_date) ) AS barcode from (SELECT sk0000_today.on_hand_qty, sk0000_today.on_order_qty, sk0000_today.article_id, sk0000_today.major_vendor_id FROM sk0000_today WHERE sk0000_today.article_id = #{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sk0000_today.store_cd=#{dto.storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MA1100.article_id, ma1100.article_name, ma1100.sales_unit_id AS unit_id, MA0220.unit_name, ma1100.spec FROM MA1100,MA0220 WHERE MA1100.article_id =#{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MA0220.unit_id=ma1100.sales_unit_id )AS B ON B.article_id=A.article_id
